dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
5 bar scales on map given in “Miliaria Germanic”, “Militia romana et hebraeorum”, “Stadia graeca et hebraeorum”, “Parasangae comprehendentes stadia triginta”, and “Pedis Romani”.
Each map has a decorative title cartouche with various illustrations of people, animals, vegetation, ships, and cherubs.
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes portrait: Hadrianus Relandus XXXVI. / Colasius pinxit ; G. Broedelet exudit ; Gunst sculpsit.
Includes table: Longitudines latitudinesque urbium Palaestinae.
